== Thinkalkarikkakom (628395) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Thinkalkarikkakom is a village in the [[Pathanapuram]] taluka of [[Kollam]] district with an area of 8901 hectares and harbouring 4846 households with total population of 18790 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Punalur]] is at a distance of 26 km. Male population is 8755 and female population is 10035. Scheduled Caste Population is 3881 and Scheduled Tribes population is 1328. Census Location Code of the village is 628395<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

* Literate male population: 7384 (84.34%)
* Literate female population: 8034 (80.06%)
